snippet: The Jets’ only trip to the Super Bowl followed the 1968 season, but they have connections to the head coaches who will be involved this year.
abstract: New York Jets are not going to the Super Bowl this year but two of their former coaches, Pete Carroll of Seattle Seahawks and Bill Belichick of New England Patriots, are facing each other.
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ only trip to the Super Bowl followed the 1968 season, but they have connections to the head coaches who will be involved this year.

headline.main: For Jets, Loose Ties to the Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: As Close as It Gets for the Jets
